name: Mole Negro Oaxaqueño
description: Traditional Oaxacan black mole served over slow-cooked chicken, accompanied by handmade tortillas.

name: Tacos de Rajas con Crema
description: Roasted poblano peppers sautéed with cream and corn, served in soft corn tortillas.

name: Camarones al Mojo de Ajo
description: Shrimp sautéed in a rich garlic sauce, served with Mexican-style rice.

name: Pescado a la Veracruzana
description: Grilled fish fillet topped with a spicy tomato sauce with capers, olives, and herbs.

name: Barbacoa de Cordero
description: Tender lamb slow-cooked in a savory broth, served with diced onions, cilantro, and salsa verde.

name: Taquitos Dorados
description: Crispy rolled tacos filled with shredded chicken or beef, served with guacamole, sour cream, and salsa.

name: Salsa Trio with Chips
description: A trio of homemade salsas – salsa verde, salsa roja, and pico de gallo – served with crispy corn tortilla chips.

name: Elote Asado
description: Grilled corn on the cob coated with creamy chipotle mayo, cotija cheese, and sprinkled with chili powder.

name: Mini Quesadillas
description: Small flour tortillas filled with melted cheese and a choice of chicken, beef, or mushrooms, served with salsa.

name: Ceviche Tostadas
description: Fresh citrus-marinated fish or shrimp served on crispy tostadas with avocado and sliced jalapeños.

name: Jalapeño Rellenos
description: Jalapeños stuffed with a blend of cheeses and spices, wrapped in bacon, and baked until crispy.

name: Carne Asada Plate
description: Grilled marinated steak served with Mexican rice, refried beans, guacamole, pico de gallo, and warm tortillas.

name: Pollo en Mole Poblano
description: Chicken breast simmered in a traditional mole poblano sauce, a rich blend of chocolate and chilies, accompanied by white rice and corn tortillas.

name: Camarones a la Diabla
description: Spicy devil shrimp sautéed in a fiery red sauce, served with rice, beans, and a lime wedge.

name: Chimichanga
description: Deep-fried burrito filled with your choice of beef, chicken, or pork, topped with cheese sauce, served with rice and beans.

name: Vegetarian Enchiladas Verdes
description: Corn tortillas rolled around sautéed vegetables, topped with a tangy green tomatillo sauce and melted cheese, served with rice and beans.

name: Pescado al Ajillo
description: Grilled fish fillet seasoned with garlic and lime, served with a side of roasted vegetables and Mexican rice.

name: Classic Margarita
description: A traditional blend of tequila, triple sec, and fresh lime juice, served on the rocks or blended with a salt rim.

name: Horchata
description: A refreshing, sweet rice drink flavored with cinnamon and vanilla, served chilled.

name: Michelada
description: A Mexican beer cocktail made with lime juice, assorted sauces, spices, and tomato juice, served in a chilled, salt-rimmed glass.

name: Agua de Jamaica
description: A tart and sweet hibiscus tea, served cold, often sweetened with sugar and garnished with a slice of lime.

name: Paloma
description: A popular Mexican cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and grapefruit-flavored soda, served on the rocks with a salted rim.

name: Tamarindo Drink
description: A sweet and sour beverage made from tamarind fruit, sugar, and water, served chilled, often with a lime wedge.
